mdRecord.dcterms:description: To the east from East Holly Street

The San Francisco architecture firm of Bakewell and Brown designed the City Beautiful and California Mediterranean of Mediterranean Revival Style and Spanish Colonial Revival Style architecture influenced City Hall.--http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Pasadena_City_Hall [work]
